message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you taking the time to talk with me. While the product is appealing,  $900,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $850,000. This would still be a good deal for both of us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $900,000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.
